div.p: FINALLY, THE TIP OF THE DAY. I DON'T KNOW ABOUT YOU, BUT I
NEED SOME LAUGHS THIS WEEKEND. SO I WAS THINKING ABOUT WHAT
MOVIE IS REALLY AMAZING FROM START -- AMUSING FROM START TO
FINISH. THERE ARE A FEW CANDIDATES, LIKE
"MASH," EARLY WOODY ALLEN STUFF.HERE IS MY FAVORITE FUNNY FILM.
>> I SAID IT WAS FUNNY. NOT POLITICALLY CORRECT.
THAT'S THE ORIGINAL "PRODUCERS." WATCH IT THIS WEEKEND.
YOU'LL THANK ME. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
THAT'S IT FOR US TONIGHT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FACTOR WEB
SITE. ALSO, WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT
